definition: to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: Information section of each audio playback time equal to the total time divided by 600.
sentences.chinese: 每个信息段的录放音时间等于总时间除以600。

sentences.english: A cassette tape recorder can easily record sound on and play sound back from tape.
sentences.chinese: 盒式录音机可以很容易地用磁带录音和放音。

sentences.english: This video plays intermittent as a result of the poor contact of the plug.
sentences.chinese: 这台录影机放音断断续续的，就插销接触不好。

sentences.english: No, not until you press the PLAY button.
The computer simulation is applied to analyze the playing system of cassette recorder mechanism in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文应用数字仿真分析录音机机芯放音系统。

definition: to receive a radio signal/to make an audio recording/(of an auditorium etc) to have good acoustics/(vocal training, linguistics) ending (of a word or syllable)
loudspeaker box/speaker (audio equipment)/resonating chamber of a musical instrument/sound box
sound/acoustics/audio/hi-fi system/stereo sound system/abbr. for 組合音響|组合音响[zu3 he2 yin1 xiang3]
